name: Widnows01
description:
Relive the joy and wonders of Windows 98 with this fun little simulator.

You're late printing your assignment out! All you have is a really really old computer. Your goal is to navigate through this rip off operating system and find a way to print your assignment. Seems simple, but old systems will never work the way you expect them too.

Created for a Game Jam with the theme "chaos"
